Diane Wagner. Acting Teacher, Actor, Performance Coach, Playwright, Screenwriter, Theatre Director, Theatrical Armourer, Theatrical Producer and Voice Artist.
Diane Wagner is a writer, actress, and educator who returned to the Lehigh Valley in 2003 to join the inaugural faculty at Charter Arts.
